item.title: Autoscaling Redis applications on Kubernetes ðŸš€ðŸš€
item.description: This blog post demonstrates how to auto-scale your Redis based applications on Kubernetes. Redis is a widely used (and loved!) database which supports a rich set of data structures (String, Hash, Streams, Geospatial), as well as other features such as pub/sub messaging, clustering (HA) etc.
